Posted By: Jason Duncan
I have the following N172 OJs for sale.  Prices include insured shipping.  I accept checks or MOs.  I am liquidating the majority of my collection. I do not have scans available right away, but will be working on them this week and next week in photobucket.  This comes from a private collection and all cards have great eye appeal for the technical grades.  I give 100% full refund guarantee if not satisfied within 7 days.  Here is the list:
